text: Jonathan G. Meath (born September 16, 1955) is an American television producer. He is known for dressing up as Santa Claus. He won a Peabody Award in 1993. Meath was born on September 16, 1955 in Baltimore, Maryland. He was raised in Boston, Massachusetts and in Harrisville, New Hampshire. Meath studied at New York University and at Phillips Academy. He has two children. Meath now lives in Cambridge, Massachusetts. ==References== ==Other websites== * MeathMedia website * YouTube video about making candy canes * Jonathan Meath on NPR as Santa * Santa JG website * Santa JG on Facebook Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Actors from Boston Category:Actors from New Hampshire Category:Peabody Award winners
title: Jonathan Meath
